Ensure womenâ€™s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator refers to the proportion of females in the total number of persons employed in management positions. For the purposes of this indicator, the International Standard Classification of Occupations (ISCO) ISCO major group 1 is used.
COMPARABILITY:
Indicator available

Distribution (%) of usually employed population by occupation group of main usual jobs, according to urban/rural and sex
